divs: sighting detailswe was driving down the highway on our way home from a ufo conf. (cero) i am [name removed\cms\tg] witness to travis walton abduction. i was talking at the confer. my wife was looking at the sky when she noticed three ships she watched these ships she would watch till she could not turn her head toward the back side window then they would disappear and she thought they was gone then she would look at the front of the passenger side window and they would appear again. they followed us for 150 miles then disappeared.they would fly in a motion that a plane doesn't move up and down all of a sudden. fly in a v form. they had green\blue lights she could see on the bottom. they would just disappear then show up again. no airplanes in sight or airports. she was excited to see them. they just disappeared. i am [name removed\cms\tg] and i was a witness to travis waltons abduction. i have been regressed by [name removed\cms\tg] and had it filmed by [name removed\cms\tg]. i have my own contacts with aliens and abduction. i am now getting into ufo hunting. i would like to be considered for any future confer. you may be putting together. thanks [name removed\cms\tg]. [phone number removed\cms\tg]
Summary: we seen three ships in the sky after a ufo confer. in Ca. (cero) followed us for three hours.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
